name: modern-editor-vscode
description: Modern Editor webview for VS Code (private/local).

modernEditor.debugLogging.description: Enable verbose logging for the Modern Editor extension.

modernEditor.compile.viewMode.description: Choose how Save & Compile runs LaTeX Workshop: build only, build+view in VS Code, or build+view in an external viewer.

modernEditor.compile.refocusAfterView.description: After Save & Compile view runs, refocus the Modern Editor webview panel.

modernEditor.sync.refocusAfterReverse.description: After reverse SyncTeX (PDF -> source) triggers, refocus the Modern Editor panel.

modernEditor.sync.reverseFocusBehavior.description: After reverse SyncTeX (PDF -> source), choose focus behavior: none (stay in source), modernEditor (focus webview), or pdf (return focus to PDF).

modernEditor.retainContextWhenHidden.description: Keep the Modern Editor webview running when hidden (prevents clearing the document when switching tabs; uses more memory).
